metadata.subject: Bible
Censorship
metadata.title: Seconde ordonnance de Monseignevr l'Illvstrissime et Reverendissime Hardovin de Perefixe Archevesqve de Paris, portant condamnation de la traduction du Nouveau Testament imprimée à Mons
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Archdiocese of Paris (France).Archbishop (1662-1671 : Péréfixe de Beaumont)
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1662-1671 : Péréfixe de Beaumont)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 2 no. 32
metadata.description: Concerns Le Maistre's translation, revised by Antoine Arnauld and other Port Royalists
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
